summary: Koozie Group has achieved CarbonNeutral certification and emphasizes its commitment to sustainability in the promotional products industry. The company has implemented various measures to reduce carbon emissions, including eliminating single-use plastics and reusing materials. title: HONEYWELL AND GRANBIO TO PRODUCE CARBON NEUTRAL SUSTAINABLE AVIATION FUEL - PR Newswire
summary: Honeywell and GranBio Technologies announced a collaboration to produce carbon neutral sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) from biomass residues using Honeywell's ethanol to jet technology combined with GranBio's cellulosic ethanol AVAP technology. The process aims to reduce greenhouse gas emissions to net zero on a lifecycle basis and utilizes low-cost, low-carbon feedstocks. Their forthcoming demonstration plant is supported by an $80M grant from the U.S. Department of Energy and is expected to produce around 2 million gallons of SAF annually upon startup in 2026. Honeywell has committed to achieving carbon neutrality in its operations by 2035.

business_innovation: TRUE, because the collaboration between Honeywell and GranBio involves a new and improved process to produce sustainable aviation fuel, which is a significant change from traditional aviation fuel production methods.
green_product: TRUE, because the sustainable aviation fuel produced from biomass is designed to significantly reduce its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, because the AVAP and ethanol to jet processes minimize environmental impacts by using low-cost biomass feedstocks and aiming for carbon neutrality through renewable resource utilization.

title: Do consumers buy into carbon claims? - Footprint
summary: The article discusses the rise and scrutiny of carbon neutral claims by food companies, highlighting a disconnect between consumer concern for climate change and actual purchasing behavior of carbon neutral products. It warns against the use of carbon offsets as a shortcut to sustainability, suggesting that while they raise awareness, they may not lead to genuine emissions reductions. Despite increasing scrutiny, some companies are reconsidering their carbon neutral strategies amid concerns of being labeled as greenwashers. Ultimately, the article advocates for a greater focus on actual emissions reductions rather than relying solely on offsets.

summary: Apple is shifting more of its product shipping from air to ocean transport to reduce carbon emissions, as logistics account for about 9% of its carbon footprint. title: Sweetgreen to Only Use Extra Virgin Olive Oil for Salads & Bowls - Green Queen Media
summary: Sweetgreen will become the first fast-casual restaurant chain in the US to exclusively use heart-healthy extra virgin olive oil (EVOO) for cooking, focusing on sustainable sourcing and a plant-forward menu. The company aims to meet growing consumer demand for minimally processed and sustainably sourced food while also pledging to become carbon-neutral by 2027. Sweetgreen partners with suppliers committed to sustainable farming and explores using avocado oil, demonstrating innovation in healthier and more environmentally friendly cooking oils. This shift aligns with industry trends towards better, sustainable food options.

summary: EcoSoul, founded by Rahul Singh and Arvind Ganesan in 2020, focuses on providing eco-friendly everyday essentials made from sustainable materials. EcoSoul emphasizes affordability and sustainability in its offerings, addressing a significant gap in the market for green products.
